## What if... Thrusters

What if the Thrusters were nodes, and they communicated the applied_force to  object they are attached to. This would allow for future configuration. 


This is something I try once I get something resembling a game done

## Do bounce tween for rotation

Hopefully this makes the ship feel more organic, so it that it ship rotation

## Add Fuel Economy

I think the interesting thing with Newtonain Space physics is how fuel economy comes into play

## Create Particles when Turning

Adds more juice

Adds more juice

## Smooth out line

I think I just need to lerp the last to the second to last point and remove when they're close enough

## Visualize the Thrust Direction Effect in UI
Create some sort of balance object to show the end user that the current Thrust less powerful or more powerful based on ship direction

## Add Boost Fuel
Right now Boost is over powered. It's fun at the moment, but there needs to be some sort of fuel

## Create Four Axis Space Moment

The play moves in 4 axis of thrusters,

## Create Four Axis Space Moment
